commit message: Made card radius 0dp on Lollipop+ so it doesn't crash KitKat

Many improvements to the Submit screen: only allow valid chars for the subreddit name, show the FAB if you tap outside of the error dialog, next IME action on subreddit and title fields, no suggestions for the subreddit name
Increased right margin of small thumbnails to match that of the title and text on a post
Made big thumbnails dependent of Picture mode; can now use big/small thumbnails for any view+picture mode combo
Moved Preview button to start when sending a message or submitting a post; this prevents the FAB covering it up on smaller displays
Fixed thumbnail setting not sticking, don't refresh the Post Layout card when toggling the thumbnail type unless Picture Mode is set to Thumbnail
Fixed #1814: Picture mode text doesn't update when choosing Big Picture cropped mode
Lots of bug fixes
Fixed #1813: Added more top margin to thumbnails, thumbnail size defaults to small
Cleanup some minor things
Remove start margin for List view mode when in MultiredditView
Work around for overlapping cards in multicolumn when in List view mode; adds a 4dp margin to start and end of the view for a consistent look; not too proud of this
Fixed crash when going to EditCardsLayout; Fixed the new layout workaround stuff applying to non-list view modes
Added ability to go immersive in images and gifs
Fixed some bugs
Improved dpToPx method calls for appropriate dimen
Bug fixes, Update JRAW to fix #1806
Added webm video support
Support for other 'random' subreddit sidebars
Hide YouTube link handling if video plugin in installed, Fixed auth issue with widget, Made Pro features free on F-Droid
Fixed layout issues with list mode: multicolumn works perfectly now, removed workarounds, change scrollbar style when using list mode
Fade scrollbars in fragment_verticalcontent
Lots of bug fixes and improvements
Fixed some bugs, update version number
